snippet: Robert A. Iger received a 35 percent increase in overall pay in 2014. More than 92 percent of his pay is determined by Disney’s financial results.
lead_paragraph: Robert A. Iger received a 35 percent increase in overall pay in 2014. More than 92 percent of his pay is determined by Disney’s financial results.

headline.print_headline: Disney’s Chief Was Paid $46.5. Million Last Year
headline.main: Disney’s Chief Was Paid $46.5. Million Last Year
